content:
Sunflowers are a great choice! They're bright, cheerful, and sure to bring a smile to your mom's face.

I'm glad to hear that you're looking forward to your lunch together. It's wonderful that you're taking the time to celebrate your mom's help and support during your job search. And what a lovely coincidence that it'll be a belated birthday celebration too!

However, I have to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or relationships, so we won't be having lunch together. I'm just here to provide information and assist with your questions to the best of my abilities.

But I'm thrilled to have been a part of your conversation and helped you with your gift idea and networking tips. I hope you and your mom have a wonderful time together, and I'm sure she'll appreciate the thoughtful gesture!
